newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: St Barbara gold output below budget.
newsitem.headline: St Barbara gold output below budget.

text.p: Western Australian gold producer St Barbara Mines Ltd said on Thursday that gold output in the first nine months of 1996/97 was five percent below budget at 102,184 ounces.

The company, which did not release comparable figures, said production in the March quarter was 33,248 ounces and in the month of March was 13,485 ounces, the highest monthly result since December 1994.
Production in the year to June 30, 1996, fell to 118,588 ounces from 137,684 ounces a year earlier.
